translations.translation: But the more I called, they only ran the farther away.
but the more I called, the farther they fled.
but it has had no effect on them except to make them run away.
“So for them, my calling them increased their fleeing away.”
But all my calling added nothing but to (their) flight.
But my call has only made them flee the more:
but my calling has only increased them in flight.
But all my calling doth but add to their repugnance;
but my pleas have only increased their aversion.
And my calling hath only increased them in fleeing.
but my summons only increases their evasion.
But my call only increases (their) flight (from the Right).
But all my calling added nothing but to (their) flight (from the truth).
but my call has only increased them in running away.
But my call added only to their flight.
But my invitation increased them not except in flight.
[71:6] but my summon has only increased their evasion, of faith.
(But all my calling) to them to repent and believe in Allah's divine Oneness (doth but add to their repugnance) does but increase their remoteness from faith and repentance;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآئِيۤ } ودعوتي إياهم { إِلاَّ فِرَاراً } [نوح: 6] عن الإيمان والإطاعة وإصراراً على الكفكر والطغيان
